channel.title: What community archive nodes can I use with the Radix Desktop Wallet?
channel.description:
Some Validators run public, community archive nodes that may be useful when there is a lot of demand on the official Radix Archive Nodes:
**Risk Warning - whilst the archive nodes listed below are run by known, long serving community members, please be advised that they are not official Radix nodes and so do require a certain amount of trust. There is an element of risk in the unlikely event that a community archive node runner acted maliciously.**
### Community Archive Nodes (MAINNET)
* `https://api.radix.community` * `https://archive.stakesafe.net` * `https://node.radixscan.io` * `https://node.caviarnine.com`
### Changing the Radix Wallet Archive Node: Open the Radix Wallet application, then:
1. Select **Wallet Settings** 2. Select the **Choose Node/Network** tab 3. Type in one of the Community Archive node addresses from the list above 4. Click the **+ add node** button
![wallet_choose_node|690x407](upload://zNWZbbQwM2BMdnriD22pV6tW3le.jpeg)
5. Click the **Connect to MAINNET** button to confirm Archive Node Change
![wallet_confirm_node|690x408, 50%](upload://30fMZVZ33KiHFyQgtyOrXT18UdP.png)
6. The wallet will restart and you will be prompted to enter your password again
![Screenshot 2022-01-01 at 12.14.19|690x449, 50%](upload://tOmZBcyEiHJemH0fsYT1DOuD7w6.png)
### About the Community Archive Nodes * [api.radix.community](https://radix.community) * [archive.stakesafe.net](https://archive.stakesafe.net) * [node.radixscan.io](https://www.radixscan.io/EmmogluStakeryArchiveNode.shtml) * [node.caviarnine.com](https://caviarnine.com/#nodes)
